official-title.#text:
To delay until 2016 provisions of the Patient Protection
		  and Affordable Care Act scheduled to take effect in 2014 or 2015 and to delay
		  the application of sequestration until 2014.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

committee-name.#tail:
,
			 and in addition to the Committees on

, for
			 a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for
			 consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the
			 committee concerned

text.#text:
Notwithstanding any other provision of law,
			 any provision of (including any amendment made by) the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Patient Protection and
			 Affordable Care Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
that is otherwise scheduled to take effect in 2014 or 2015 shall not
			 take effect until January 1, 2016.
